+## ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆæ¦‚è¦

+## å®Ÿæ–½å†…å®¹ã¨è©•ä¾¡

+
+### ä¿®æ­£ã—ãŸã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼è©³ç´°
+
+#### 1. å­˜åœ¨ã—ãªã„test-idå‚ç…§ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼
+**å•é¡Œ:** `current-puyo`, `score-display` test-idãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ãªã„  
+**è§£æ±ºç­–:** æ—¢å­˜ã®é©åˆ‡ãªtest-idã«ç½®æ›

+
+**å½±éŸ¿åº¦:** é«˜ï¼ˆè¤‡æ•°ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãŒå¤±æ•—ï¼‰  
+**ä¿®æ­£å·¥æ•°:** 1h
+
+#### 2. ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚·ãƒ“ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ã‚«ã‚¹å‡¦ç†
+**å•é¡Œ:** Tab ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒŠãƒ“ã‚²ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§ã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ã‚«ã‚¹å–å¾—ãŒä¸å®‰å®š  
+**è§£æ±ºç­–:** ç›´æ¥ `focus()` ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨  
+**å½±éŸ¿åº¦:** ä¸­ï¼ˆ1ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãŒå¤±æ•—ï¼‰  
+**ä¿®æ­£å·¥æ•°:** 0.5h
+
+#### 3. ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ

+      - name: Install Playwright Browsers
+        working-directory: ./app
+        run: npx playwright install --with-deps
+        if: matrix.node-version == '22.x'
+
+      - name: Run E2E tests
+        working-directory: ./app
+        run: npm run test:e2e
+        if: matrix.node-version == '22.x'
+
+      - name: Upload Playwright Report
+        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
+        if: always() && matrix.node-version == '22.x'
+        with:
+          name: playwright-report-${{ matrix.node-version }}
+          path: app/playwright-report/
+          retention-days: 30
+
       - name: Upload test results to Codecov
         if: ${{ !cancelled() }}
         uses: codecov/test-results-action@v1
diff --git a/.github/workflows/e2e.yml b/.github/workflows/e2e.yml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..796aba4
--- /dev/null
+++ b/.github/workflows/e2e.yml
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+name: E2E Tests
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches: [ main, develop ]
+  pull_request:
+    branches: [ main ]
+
+jobs:
+  test:
+    timeout-minutes: 60
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    
+    steps:
+    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
+    
+    - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
+      with:
+        node-version: 18
+        cache: 'npm'
+        cache-dependency-path: 'app/package-lock.json'
+    
+    - name: Install dependencies
+      run: |
+        cd app
+        npm ci
+    
+    - name: Install Playwright Browsers
+      run: |
+        cd app
+        npx playwright install --with-deps
+    
+    - name: Run unit tests first
+      run: |
+        cd app
+        npm run test -- --run
+    
+    - name: Build application
+      run: |
+        cd app
+        npm run build
+    
+    - name: Run Playwright tests
+      run: |
+        cd app
+        npx playwright test
+    
+    - name: Upload Playwright Report
+      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
+      if: always()
+      with:
+        name: playwright-report
+        path: app/playwright-report/
+        retention-days: 30
+    
+    - name: Upload Test Results
+      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
+      if: always()
+      with:
+        name: test-results
+        path: app/test-results/
+        retention-days: 30
\ No newline at end of file

+import { defineConfig, devices } from '@playwright/test'
+
+/**
+ * Playwrightè¨­å®š
+ * ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆæˆ¦ç•¥ã«åŸºã¥ã„ãŸE2Eãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã®è¨­å®š
+ */
+export default defineConfig({
+  testDir: './tests',
+  /* ä¸¦åˆ—ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå®Ÿè¡Œ */
+  fullyParallel: true,
+  /* CIç’°å¢ƒã§ã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå¤±æ•—æ™‚ã®å†è©¦è¡Œã‚’ç„¡åŠ¹ */
+  forbidOnly: !!process.env.CI,
+  /* CIç’°å¢ƒã§ã®å†è©¦è¡Œè¨­å®š */
+  retries: process.env.CI ? 2 : 0,
+  /* ä¸¦åˆ—å®Ÿè¡Œãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ¼æ•° */
+  workers: process.env.CI ? 1 : undefined,
+  /* ãƒ¬ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆè¨­å®š */
+  reporter: [
+    ['html', { outputFolder: 'playwright-report' }],
+    ['json', { outputFile: 'test-results.json' }],
+  ],
+
+  /* ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå®Ÿè¡Œå‰ã®è¨­å®š */
+  use: {
+    /* å®Ÿè¡Œæ™‚ã®ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹URL */
+    baseURL: 'http://127.0.0.1:5173',
+    /* ã™ã¹ã¦ã®æ“ä½œã‚’ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¹ */
+    trace: 'on-first-retry',
+    /* ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒˆè¨­å®š */
+    screenshot: 'only-on-failure',
+  },
+
+  /* ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå®Ÿè¡Œå‰ã«ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’èµ·å‹• */
+  webServer: {
+    command: 'npm run dev',
+    url: 'http://127.0.0.1:5173',
+    reuseExistingServer: !process.env.CI,
+    timeout: 120 * 1000,
+  },
+
+  /* ã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¹ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆè¨­å®š */
+  projects: [
+    {
+      name: 'chromium',
+      use: { ...devices['Desktop Chrome'] },
+    },
+    {
+      name: 'firefox',
+      use: { ...devices['Desktop Firefox'] },
+    },
+    {
+      name: 'webkit',
+      use: { ...devices['Desktop Safari'] },
+    },
+    /* ãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ */
+    {
+      name: 'Mobile Chrome',
+      use: { ...devices['Pixel 5'] },
+    },
+    {
+      name: 'Mobile Safari',
+      use: { ...devices['iPhone 12'] },
+    },
+  ],
+})

+import { test, expect } from '@playwright/test'
+
+/**
+ * ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ åŸºæœ¬æ©Ÿèƒ½ã®E2Eãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ
+ * ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆæˆ¦ç•¥ã«åŸºã¥ã„ãŸãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ªãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ
+ */
+test.describe('ã·ã‚ˆã·ã‚ˆã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ åŸºæœ¬æ©Ÿèƒ½', () => {
+  test.beforeEach(async ({ page }) => {
+    await page.goto('/')
+    await expect(page.locator('h1')).toContainText('ã·ã‚ˆã·ã‚ˆã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ')
+  })
+
+  test('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹ã‹ã‚‰åŸºæœ¬æ“ä½œã¾ã§', async ({ page }) => {
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    const startButton = page.getByTestId('start-button')
+    await expect(startButton).toBeVisible()
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+    await startButton.click()
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+    const gameBoard = page.getByTestId('game-board')
+    await expect(gameBoard).toBeVisible()
+
+    // NEXTã·ã‚ˆãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+    const nextPuyoArea = page.getByTestId('next-puyo-area')
+    await expect(nextPuyoArea).toBeVisible()
+    await expect(nextPuyoArea).toContainText('NEXT')
+
+    // NEXTã·ã‚ˆã®å€‹åˆ¥è¦ç´ ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+    const nextMainPuyo = page.getByTestId('next-main-puyo')
+    const nextSubPuyo = page.getByTestId('next-sub-puyo')
+    await expect(nextMainPuyo).toBeVisible()
+    await expect(nextSubPuyo).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰æ“ä½œã§ã·ã‚ˆã‚’ç§»å‹•ã§ãã‚‹', async ({ page }) => {
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    // åˆæœŸä½ç½®ã‚’è¨˜éŒ²
+    const gameBoard = page.getByTestId('game-board')
+    await expect(gameBoard).toBeVisible()
+
+    // å·¦ç§»å‹•
+    await page.keyboard.press('ArrowLeft')
+    await page.waitForTimeout(100) // ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å¾…æ©Ÿ
+
+    // å³ç§»å‹•
+    await page.keyboard.press('ArrowRight')
+    await page.waitForTimeout(100)
+
+    // å›è»¢
+    await page.keyboard.press('ArrowUp')
+    await page.waitForTimeout(100)
+
+    // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—
+    await page.keyboard.press('Space')
+    await page.waitForTimeout(500) // ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å¾…æ©Ÿ
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒç¶™ç¶šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèªï¼ˆNEXTã·ã‚ˆãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ï¼‰
+    const nextPuyoArea = page.getByTestId('next-puyo-area')
+    await expect(nextPuyoArea).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã¾ã§ã®ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ¼', async ({ page }) => {
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã®é«˜ã•ã‚’èª¿ã¹ã¦ã€ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã¾ã§ã·ã‚ˆã‚’ç©ã¿ä¸Šã’ã‚‹
+    let gameOverOccurred = false
+    let attempts = 0
+    const maxAttempts = 100 // ç„¡é™ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—ã‚’é˜²ã
+
+    while (!gameOverOccurred && attempts < maxAttempts) {
+      try {
+        // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ã§ã·ã‚ˆã‚’è½ã¨ã™
+        await page.keyboard.press('Space')
+        await page.waitForTimeout(300)
+
+        // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
+        const gameOverElement = page.locator('[data-testid="game-over"]')
+        if (await gameOverElement.isVisible({ timeout: 1000 })) {
+          gameOverOccurred = true
+        }
+
+        attempts++
+      } catch {
+        // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã¯ç„¡è¦–ã—ã¦ç¶šè¡Œ
+        attempts++
+      }
+    }
+
+    // æœ€ä½é™ã®ã·ã‚ˆæ•°ã¯é…ç½®ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¯ãš
+    expect(attempts).toBeGreaterThan(5)
+  })
+
+  test('é€£é–ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã™ã‚‹ã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ª', async ({ page }) => {
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    // é€£é–ã‚’èµ·ã“ã™ãŸã‚ã®ã·ã‚ˆé…ç½®ï¼ˆå®Ÿéš›ã®å®Ÿè£…ã§ã¯æ‰‹å‹•é…ç½®ã¯å›°é›£ãªã®ã§ã€
+    // åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªæ“ä½œã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦é€£é–ã®å¯èƒ½æ€§ã‚’ç¢ºèªï¼‰
+    for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
+      // å·¦å³ã«ç§»å‹•ã—ãªãŒã‚‰ã·ã‚ˆã‚’è½ã¨ã™
+      if (i % 2 === 0) {
+        await page.keyboard.press('ArrowLeft')
+      } else {
+        await page.keyboard.press('ArrowRight')
+      }
+      await page.keyboard.press('Space')
+      await page.waitForTimeout(300)
+    }
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒå®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèªï¼ˆNEXTã·ã‚ˆãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ï¼‰
+    const nextPuyoArea = page.getByTestId('next-puyo-area')
+    await expect(nextPuyoArea).toBeVisible()
+
+    // å®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚ŒãŸã“ã¨ã®ç¢ºèª
+    const gameBoard = page.getByTestId('game-board')
+    await expect(gameBoard).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ–è¡¨ç¤ºã®ç¢ºèª', async ({ page }) => {
+    // ãƒ‡ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ã‚µã‚¤ã‚º
+    await page.setViewportSize({ width: 1200, height: 800 })
+    await expect(page.locator('h1')).toBeVisible()
+
+    // ã‚¿ãƒ–ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆã‚µã‚¤ã‚º
+    await page.setViewportSize({ width: 768, height: 1024 })
+    await expect(page.locator('h1')).toBeVisible()
+
+    // ãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚µã‚¤ã‚º
+    await page.setViewportSize({ width: 375, height: 667 })
+    await expect(page.locator('h1')).toBeVisible()
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+    const startButton = page.getByTestId('start-button')
+    await expect(startButton).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚·ãƒ“ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£åŸºæœ¬ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯', async ({ page }) => {
+    // h1è¦‹å‡ºã—ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    await expect(page.locator('h1')).toBeVisible()
+
+    // ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã«ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    const startButton = page.getByTestId('start-button')
+    await expect(startButton).toBeVisible()
+
+    // ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒŠãƒ“ã‚²ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+    await page.keyboard.press('Tab')
+    await expect(startButton).toBeFocused()
+
+    // Enterã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’æŠ¼ä¸‹ã§ãã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    await page.keyboard.press('Enter')
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ç”»é¢ã«é·ç§»
+    const gameBoard = page.getByTestId('game-board')
+    await expect(gameBoard).toBeVisible()
+  })
+})
diff --git a/app/tests/user-scenarios.spec.ts b/app/tests/user-scenarios.spec.ts

+++ b/app/tests/user-scenarios.spec.ts

+import { test, expect, Page } from '@playwright/test'
+
+/**
+ * ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ªE2Eãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ
+ * ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆæˆ¦ç•¥ã«åŸºã¥ã„ãŸå®Œå…¨ãªãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ªã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ
+ */
+test.describe('ã·ã‚ˆã·ã‚ˆã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ  ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ª', () => {
+  test('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹ã‹ã‚‰é€£é–ã¾ã§', async ({ page }) => {
+    await page.goto('/')
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    // ã·ã‚ˆæ“ä½œ
+    await page.keyboard.press('ArrowLeft')
+    await page.keyboard.press('ArrowLeft')
+    await page.keyboard.press('Space') // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—
+
+    // æ¬¡ã®ã·ã‚ˆã‚’å³å´ã«é…ç½®
+    await page.keyboard.press('ArrowRight')
+    await page.keyboard.press('ArrowRight')
+    await page.keyboard.press('Space')
+
+    // ã•ã‚‰ã«ã·ã‚ˆã‚’é…ç½®
+    await page.keyboard.press('ArrowLeft')
+    await page.keyboard.press('Space')
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒç¶™ç¶šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèªï¼ˆNEXTã·ã‚ˆãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ï¼‰
+    const nextPuyoArea = page.getByTestId('next-puyo-area')
+    await expect(nextPuyoArea).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('æ–°è¦ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã®å®Œå…¨ãªã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤', async ({ page }) => {
+    await page.goto('/')
+
+    // åˆå›è¨ªå•æ™‚ã®ç”»é¢ç¢ºèª
+    await expect(page.locator('h1')).toContainText('ã·ã‚ˆã·ã‚ˆã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ')
+
+    // æ“ä½œèª¬æ˜ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’æœŸå¾…ï¼ˆå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚Œã°ï¼‰
+    const instructions = page.locator('[data-testid="instructions"]')
+    if (await instructions.isVisible()) {
+      await expect(instructions).toContainText('æ“ä½œ')
+    }
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    // æœ€åˆã®ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚’æ¨¡æ“¬
+    for (let move = 0; move < 5; move++) {
+      // æ§˜ã€…ãªæ“ä½œã‚’çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›
+      if (move % 3 === 0) {
+        await page.keyboard.press('ArrowLeft')
+      } else if (move % 3 === 1) {
+        await page.keyboard.press('ArrowRight')
+      }
+
+      if (move % 2 === 0) {
+        await page.keyboard.press('ArrowUp') // å›è»¢
+      }
+
+      await page.keyboard.press('Space') // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—
+      await page.waitForTimeout(400) // è½ä¸‹ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å¾…æ©Ÿ
+    }
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒæ­£å¸¸ã«å‹•ä½œã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    const gameBoard = page.getByTestId('game-board')
+    await expect(gameBoard).toBeVisible()
+
+    const scoreDisplay = page.getByTestId('score-display')
+    await expect(scoreDisplay).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('é•·æ™‚é–“ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã®ã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ª', async ({ page }) => {
+    await page.goto('/')
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    const moveCount = await performLongPlayTest(page)
+
+    // æœ€ä½é™ã®æ“ä½œã¯å®Œäº†ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
+    expect(moveCount).toBeGreaterThan(0)
+  })
+
+  // ãƒ˜ãƒ«ãƒ‘ãƒ¼é–¢æ•°ï¼šé•·æ™‚é–“ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã®å®Ÿè¡Œ
+  async function performLongPlayTest(page: Page): Promise<number> {
+    let moveCount = 0
+    const maxMoves = 20
+
+    while (moveCount < maxMoves) {
+      try {
+        await performRandomMove(page, moveCount)
+        await page.keyboard.press('Space')
+        await page.waitForTimeout(200)
+
+        // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
+        const gameOverElement = page.locator('[data-testid="game-over"]')
+        if (await gameOverElement.isVisible({ timeout: 100 })) {
+          break
+        }
+
+        moveCount++
+      } catch {
+        // ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ãŸå ´åˆã¯çµ‚äº†
+        break
+      }
+    }
+
+    return moveCount
+  }
+
+  // ãƒ˜ãƒ«ãƒ‘ãƒ¼é–¢æ•°ï¼šãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ ãªæ“ä½œãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã®å®Ÿè¡Œ
+  async function performRandomMove(page: Page, moveCount: number): Promise<void> {
+    const action = moveCount % 4
+    switch (action) {
+      case 0:
+        await page.keyboard.press('ArrowLeft')
+        break
+      case 1:
+        await page.keyboard.press('ArrowRight')
+        break
+      case 2:
+        await page.keyboard.press('ArrowUp')
+        break
+      case 3:
+        // ãã®ã¾ã¾è½ä¸‹
+        break
+    }
+  }
+
+  test('å¾©å¸°ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã®ã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ª', async ({ page }) => {
+    await page.goto('/')
+
+    // ä»¥å‰ã®ã‚¹ã‚³ã‚¢è¨˜éŒ²ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ï¼ˆãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ç­‰ï¼‰
+    await page.evaluate(() => {
+      return localStorage.getItem('highScore') || '0'
+    })
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    // ç†Ÿç·´ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã®æ“ä½œãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³ï¼ˆç´ æ—©ã„æ“ä½œï¼‰
+    const quickMoves = [
+      'ArrowLeft',
+      'ArrowUp',
+      'Space',
+      'ArrowRight',
+      'ArrowUp',
+      'ArrowUp',
+      'Space',
+      'ArrowLeft',
+      'Space',
+    ]
+
+    for (const move of quickMoves) {
+      await page.keyboard.press(move)
+      await page.waitForTimeout(100) // çŸ­ã„å¾…æ©Ÿæ™‚é–“
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã«ãªã£ãŸã‚‰çµ‚äº†
+      const gameOverElement = page.locator('[data-testid="game-over"]')
+      if (await gameOverElement.isVisible({ timeout: 100 })) {
+        break
+      }
+    }
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒå®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    const gameBoard = page.getByTestId('game-board')
+    await expect(gameBoard).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒªã‚«ãƒãƒªãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ª', async ({ page }) => {
+    await page.goto('/')
+
+    // ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚’ä¸€æ™‚çš„ã«åˆ‡æ–­ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½ã§ã‚ã‚Œã°ï¼‰
+    try {
+      await page.route('**/*', (route) => route.abort())
+
+      // ãã‚Œã§ã‚‚ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒå‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+      // ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚’å¾©æ—§
+      await page.unroute('**/*')
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒç¶™ç¶šã§ãã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      const gameBoard = page.getByTestId('game-board')
+      await expect(gameBoard).toBeVisible()
+    } catch {
+      // ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯åˆ¶å¾¡ãŒã§ããªã„å ´åˆã¯ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—
+      console.log('Network control not available, skipping network test')
+    }
+
+    // ç„¡åŠ¹ãªæ“ä½œã‚’è©¦è¡Œ
+    await page.keyboard.press('Escape')
+    await page.keyboard.press('F5')
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒå®‰å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    const currentPuyo = page.getByTestId('current-puyo')
+    await expect(currentPuyo).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚·ãƒŠãƒªã‚ª', async ({ page }) => {
+    await page.goto('/')
+
+    // ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹è¨ˆæ¸¬é–‹å§‹
+    const startTime = Date.now()
+
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    // åˆå›ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°æ™‚é–“ã®è¨ˆæ¸¬
+    await expect(page.getByTestId('game-board')).toBeVisible()
+    const renderTime = Date.now() - startTime
+
+    // 3ç§’ä»¥å†…ã«ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ãŒå®Œäº†ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    expect(renderTime).toBeLessThan(3000)
+
+    // é€£ç¶šæ“ä½œã®ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ
+    const operationStartTime = Date.now()
+
+    for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
+      await page.keyboard.press('ArrowLeft')
+      await page.keyboard.press('ArrowRight')
+      await page.keyboard.press('ArrowUp')
+    }
+
+    const operationTime = Date.now() - operationStartTime
+
+    // æ“ä½œã®å¿œç­”æ€§ã‚’ç¢ºèªï¼ˆ1ç§’ä»¥å†…ï¼‰
+    expect(operationTime).toBeLessThan(1000)
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒæ­£å¸¸ã«å‹•ä½œã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    const currentPuyo = page.getByTestId('current-puyo')
+    await expect(currentPuyo).toBeVisible()
+  })
+
+  test('ãƒãƒ«ãƒãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶äº’æ›æ€§ç¢ºèª', async ({ page, browserName }) => {
+    await page.goto('/')
+
+    // ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶å›ºæœ‰ã®å•é¡ŒãŒãªã„ã‹ç¢ºèª
+    await expect(page.locator('h1')).toBeVisible()
+
+    // åŸºæœ¬æ“ä½œãŒå…¨ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã§å‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    await page.getByTestId('start-button').click()
+
+    // CSS ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆãŒæ­£ã—ãè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    const gameBoard = page.getByTestId('game-board')
+    await expect(gameBoard).toBeVisible()
+
+    // ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰æ“ä½œãŒæ©Ÿèƒ½ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+    await page.keyboard.press('Space')
+    await page.waitForTimeout(300)
+
+    // æ¬¡ã®ã·ã‚ˆãŒæ­£å¸¸ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹

+    await expect(currentPuyo).toBeVisible()
+
+    console.log(`Test completed on ${browserName}`)
+  })
+})

+/**
+ * ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹
+ * ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰ä½œæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«
+ */
+
+import { describe, it, expect } from 'vitest'
+
+class SampleUser {
+  constructor(public name: string, public email: string) {}
+  
+  validate(): boolean {
+    return this.name.length > 0 && this.email.includes('@')
+  }
+  
+  changeEmail(newEmail: string): void {
+    if (!newEmail.includes('@')) {
+      throw new Error('Invalid email')
+    }
+    this.email = newEmail
+  }
+}
+
+describe('SampleUser', () => {
+  describe('ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ç”Ÿæˆ', () => {
+    it('æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½œæˆã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrangeï¼ˆæº–å‚™ï¼‰
+      const name = 'John Doe'
+      const email = 'john@example.com'
+
+      // Actï¼ˆå®Ÿè¡Œï¼‰
+      const user = new SampleUser(name, email)
+
+      // Assertï¼ˆæ¤œè¨¼ï¼‰
+      expect(user).toBeDefined()
+      expect(user.name).toBe(name)
+      expect(user.email).toBe(email)
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³', () => {
+    describe('æ­£å¸¸ç³»', () => {
+      it('æœ‰åŠ¹ãªãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’é€šéã™ã‚‹', () => {
+        // Arrange
+        const user = new SampleUser('John', 'john@example.com')
+
+        // Act
+        const isValid = user.validate()
+
+        // Assert
+        expect(isValid).toBe(true)
+      })
+    })
+
+    describe('ç•°å¸¸ç³»', () => {
+      it('åå‰ãŒç©ºã®å ´åˆã¯ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒå¤±æ•—ã™ã‚‹', () => {
+        // Arrange
+        const user = new SampleUser('', 'john@example.com')
+
+        // Act
+        const isValid = user.validate()
+
+        // Assert
+        expect(isValid).toBe(false)
+      })
+
+      it('ç„¡åŠ¹ãªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã§ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒå¤±æ•—ã™ã‚‹', () => {
+        // Arrange
+        const user = new SampleUser('John', 'invalid-email')
+
+        // Act
+        const isValid = user.validate()
+
+        // Assert
+        expect(isValid).toBe(false)
+      })
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«å¤‰æ›´', () => {
+    it('æœ‰åŠ¹ãªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã«å¤‰æ›´ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const user = new SampleUser('John', 'old@example.com')
+      const newEmail = 'new@example.com'
+
+      // Act
+      user.changeEmail(newEmail)
+
+      // Assert
+      expect(user.email).toBe(newEmail)
+    })
+
+    it('ç„¡åŠ¹ãªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã®å ´åˆã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒæŠ•ã’ã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const user = new SampleUser('John', 'old@example.com')
+      const invalidEmail = 'invalid-email'
+
+      // Act & Assert
+      expect(() => user.changeEmail(invalidEmail)).toThrow('Invalid email')
+    })
+  })
+})
\ No newline at end of file

+## ğŸš€ ä½¿ã„æ–¹
+
+### åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªä½¿ç”¨æ‰‹é †
+
+1. **ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’é¸æŠ**

+   ```bash
+   # ä¾‹: ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹å ´åˆ

+   ```
+
+2. **ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒ›ãƒ«ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’ç½®æ›**
+   - `[ModelName]`, `[ComponentName]`, `[useHookName]`, `[FeatureName]`ã‚’å®Ÿéš›ã®åå‰ã«ç½®æ›
+   - ä¸è¦ãªãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’å‰Šé™¤
+   - å¿…è¦ãªãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
+
+3. **ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’èª¿æ•´**

+   ```typescript
+   // Before
+   // import { [ModelName] } from './[ModelName]'
+
+   // After
+   import { User } from './User'
+   ```
+
+4. **ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’å®Ÿè£…**
+
+   ```typescript
+   // Before
+   it('æœŸå¾…ã•ã‚Œã‚‹å‹•ä½œã®èª¬æ˜', () => {
+     // Arrange
+     // const input = 'input'
+     // ...
+   })
+
+   // After
+   it('ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼åã‚’æ­£ã—ãè¨­å®šã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+     // Arrange
+     const userName = 'John Doe'
+
+     // Act
+     const user = new User(userName)
+
+     // Assert
+     expect(user.name).toBe(userName)
+   })
+   ```

+## ğŸ’¡ ãƒ™ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¯ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¹
+
+### ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆä½œæˆã®ã‚¬ã‚¤ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³
+
+1. **å°ã•ãå§‹ã‚ã‚‹**
+   - æœ€åˆã¯ä»®å®Ÿè£…ã‹ã‚‰å§‹ã‚ã‚‹
+   - å¾ã€…ã«å®Ÿè£…ã‚’ä¸€èˆ¬åŒ–ã™ã‚‹ï¼ˆä¸‰è§’æ¸¬é‡ï¼‰
+
+2. **æ˜ç¢ºãªåå‰ä»˜ã‘**
+   - ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹åã¯æ—¥æœ¬èªã§ã‚‚å¯
+   - ä½•ã‚’ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹æ˜ç¢ºã«è¨˜è¿°
+
+3. **3Aãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã®å¾¹åº•**
+
+   ```typescript
+   it('æ˜ç¢ºãªãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå', () => {
+     // Arrangeï¼ˆæº–å‚™ï¼‰
+     const input = prepareTestData()
+
+     // Actï¼ˆå®Ÿè¡Œï¼‰
+     const result = executeFunction(input)
+
+     // Assertï¼ˆæ¤œè¨¼ï¼‰
+     expect(result).toBe(expected)
+   })
+   ```
+
+4. **act()è­¦å‘Šã®å›é¿**
+
+   ```typescript
+   // ReactçŠ¶æ…‹æ›´æ–°ã‚’å«ã‚€æ“ä½œã¯å¿…ãšact()ã§ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒ—
+   await act(async () => {
+     fireEvent.click(button)
+   })
+   ```
+
+5. **é©åˆ‡ãªã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—**
+   ```typescript
+   afterEach(() => {
+     vi.clearAllMocks()
+     // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ã®ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—
+     act(() => {
+       vi.runOnlyPendingTimers()
+     })
+   })
+   ```

+## ğŸ“Š ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚«ãƒãƒ¬ãƒƒã‚¸ã®ç›®æ¨™
+
+- **ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯:** 100%
+- **ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ:** 90%ä»¥ä¸Š
+- **çµ±åˆãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ:** ä¸»è¦ãªãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚’ã‚«ãƒãƒ¼
+- **E2Eãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ:** ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ã‚«ãƒ«ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’ã‚«ãƒãƒ¼
+
+## ğŸ”§ ä¾¿åˆ©ãªãƒ¦ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£
+
+### ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ€ãƒ¼
+
+```typescript
+// ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆç”¨ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ç°¡å˜ã«ä½œæˆ
+const createTestUser = (overrides = {}) => ({
+  id: 1,
+  name: 'Test User',
+  email: 'test@example.com',
+  ...overrides,
+})
+```
+
+### ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒãƒƒãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼
+
+```typescript
+// ç‹¬è‡ªã®ã‚¢ã‚µãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
+expect.extend({
+  toBeValidEmail(received) {
+    const pass = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(received)
+    return {
+      pass,
+      message: () => `expected ${received} to be a valid email`,
+    }
+  },
+})
+```
+
+### ãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒ˜ãƒ«ãƒ‘ãƒ¼
+
+```typescript
+// APIãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯ã®ç°¡å˜ãªä½œæˆ
+const mockApi = (data, delay = 0) => {
+  return vi
+    .fn()
+    .mockImplementation(
+      () => new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(() => resolve(data), delay))
+    )
+}
+```

+## ğŸ“š å‚è€ƒè³‡æ–™

+- [Vitest Documentation](https://vitest.dev/)
+- [React Testing Library](https://testing-library.com/react)

+## ğŸ¤ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒªãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+
+ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã®æ”¹å–„ææ¡ˆã¯æ­“è¿ã—ã¾ã™ï¼

@@ -0,0 +1,207 @@
+/**
+ * Reactã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆ
+ *
+ * ä½¿ã„æ–¹:
+ * 1. ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¦æ–°ã—ã„ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆ
+ * 2. [ComponentName]ã‚’å®Ÿéš›ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆåã«ç½®æ›
+ * 3. å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’è¿½åŠ ãƒ»ä¿®æ­£
+ */
+
+import { describe, it, expect, beforeEach, vi } from 'vitest'
+import { render, screen, fireEvent, act, waitFor } from '@testing-library/react'
+import userEvent from '@testing-library/user-event'
+// import { [ComponentName] } from './[ComponentName]'
+
+describe('[ComponentName]', () => {
+  // ãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚„ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆç”¨ã®props
+  const defaultProps = {
+    // prop1: 'value1',
+    // prop2: 42,
+    // onEvent: vi.fn(),
+  }
+
+  beforeEach(() => {
+    // å„ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã®å‰ã«ãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
+    vi.clearAllMocks()
+  })
+
+  describe('ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°', () => {
+    it('æ­£ã—ããƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange & Act
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} />
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(screen.getByRole('button')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      // expect(screen.getByText('Expected Text')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+
+    it('propsã«å¿œã˜ã¦è¡¨ç¤ºãŒå¤‰ã‚ã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const customProps = {
+        ...defaultProps,
+        // prop1: 'different value',
+      }
+
+      // Act
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...customProps} />
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(screen.getByText('different value')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+
+    it('æ¡ä»¶ä»˜ããƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ãŒæ­£ã—ãå‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange & Act
+      const { rerender } = render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} show={false} />
+
+      // Assert - éè¡¨ç¤º
+      // expect(screen.queryByTestId('conditional-element')).not.toBeInTheDocument()
+
+      // Act - å†ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
+      rerender(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} show={true} />
+
+      // Assert - è¡¨ç¤º
+      // expect(screen.getByTestId('conditional-element')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³', () => {
+    it('ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒæ­£ã—ãå‡¦ç†ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const handleClick = vi.fn()
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} onClick={handleClick} />
+
+      // Act
+      const button = screen.getByRole('button')
+      await act(async () => {
+        fireEvent.click(button)
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      expect(handleClick).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+      // expect(handleClick).toHaveBeenCalledWith(expectedArgument)
+    })
+
+    it('ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ å…¥åŠ›ãŒæ­£ã—ãå‡¦ç†ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const handleChange = vi.fn()
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} onChange={handleChange} />
+
+      // Act
+      const input = screen.getByRole('textbox')
+      await act(async () => {
+        await userEvent.type(input, 'test input')
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(handleChange).toHaveBeenCalled()
+      // expect(input).toHaveValue('test input')
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒæ­£ã—ãå‡¦ç†ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} />
+
+      // Act
+      await act(async () => {
+        fireEvent.keyDown(document, { key: 'Enter' })
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(screen.getByText('Enter pressed')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('çŠ¶æ…‹ç®¡ç†', () => {
+    it('å†…éƒ¨çŠ¶æ…‹ãŒæ­£ã—ãæ›´æ–°ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} />
+
+      // Act - çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+      const button = screen.getByRole('button')
+      await act(async () => {
+        fireEvent.click(button)
+      })
+
+      // Assert - çŠ¶æ…‹å¤‰æ›´å¾Œã®è¡¨ç¤º
+      // expect(screen.getByText('Updated State')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+
+    it('è¤‡æ•°ã®çŠ¶æ…‹æ›´æ–°ãŒæ­£ã—ãå‡¦ç†ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} />
+
+      // Act - è¤‡æ•°ã®çŠ¶æ…‹æ›´æ–°
+      await act(async () => {
+        fireEvent.click(screen.getByTestId('increment'))
+        fireEvent.click(screen.getByTestId('increment'))
+        fireEvent.click(screen.getByTestId('decrement'))
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(screen.getByText('Count: 1')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('éåŒæœŸå‡¦ç†', () => {
+    it('ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°çŠ¶æ…‹ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} />
+
+      // Act
+      const button = screen.getByRole('button')
+      fireEvent.click(button)
+
+      // Assert - ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ä¸­
+      // expect(screen.getByText('Loading...')).toBeInTheDocument()
+
+      // Wait & Assert - å®Œäº†å¾Œ
+      await waitFor(() => {
+        // expect(screen.getByText('Loaded')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      })
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼çŠ¶æ…‹ãŒæ­£ã—ãè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange - ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚’ç™ºç”Ÿã•ã›ã‚‹è¨­å®š
+      const mockFetch = vi.fn().mockRejectedValue(new Error('Network error'))
+
+      // Act
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} onFetch={mockFetch} />
+
+      // Assert
+      await waitFor(() => {
+        // expect(screen.getByText('Error: Network error')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      })
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚·ãƒ“ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£', () => {
+    it('é©åˆ‡ãªARIAå±æ€§ãŒè¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange & Act
+      render(<div />) // <[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} />
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(screen.getByRole('button')).toHaveAttribute('aria-label', 'Expected Label')
+      // expect(screen.getByRole('navigation')).toHaveAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false')
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒŠãƒ“ã‚²ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒå¯èƒ½', async () => {

+      })

+    })

+      // const { container } = render(<[ComponentName] {...defaultProps} />)
+      // expect(container).toMatchSnapshot()
+    })
+  })
+})

+/**
+ * ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆ

+ * ä½¿ã„æ–¹:
+ * 1. ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¦æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆ
+ * 2. [ModelName]ã‚’å®Ÿéš›ã®ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«åã«ç½®æ›
+ * 3. å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’è¿½åŠ ãƒ»ä¿®æ­£

+
+  beforeEach(() => {

+/**
+ * React Hooksãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆ
+ *
+ * ä½¿ã„æ–¹:
+ * 1. ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¦æ–°ã—ã„Hooksã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆ
+ * 2. [useHookName]ã‚’å®Ÿéš›ã®Hookåã«ç½®æ›
+ * 3. å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’è¿½åŠ ãƒ»ä¿®æ­£
+ */
+
+import { describe, it, expect, beforeEach, afterEach, vi } from 'vitest'
+import { renderHook, act, waitFor } from '@testing-library/react'
+// import { [useHookName] } from './[useHookName]'
+
+describe('[useHookName]', () => {
+  beforeEach(() => {
+    // ãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯ã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—
+    vi.clearAllMocks()
+  })
+
+  afterEach(() => {
+    // ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—
+  })
+
+  describe('åˆæœŸçŠ¶æ…‹', () => {
+    it('åˆæœŸå€¤ãŒæ­£ã—ãè¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange & Act
+      const { result } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]()
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(result.current.value).toBe(initialValue)
+      // expect(result.current.loading).toBe(false)
+      // expect(result.current.error).toBeNull()
+    })
+
+    it('å¼•æ•°ä»˜ãã§åˆæœŸåŒ–ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const initialConfig = { option: 'value' }
+
+      // Act
+      const { result } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName](initialConfig)
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(result.current.config).toEqual(initialConfig)
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('çŠ¶æ…‹æ›´æ–°', () => {
+    it('å€¤ã‚’æ›´æ–°ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const { result } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]()
+      })
+
+      // Act
+      act(() => {
+        // result.current.setValue('new value')
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(result.current.value).toBe('new value')
+    })
+
+    it('è¤‡æ•°ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’åŒæ™‚ã«æ›´æ–°ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const { result } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]()
+      })
+
+      // Act
+      act(() => {
+        // result.current.updateMultiple({ a: 1, b: 2 })
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(result.current.a).toBe(1)
+      // expect(result.current.b).toBe(2)
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('å‰¯ä½œç”¨', () => {
+    it('ãƒã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆæ™‚ã«å‰¯ä½œç”¨ãŒå®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const onMount = vi.fn()
+
+      // Act
+      renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]({ onMount })
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(onMount).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+    })
+
+    it('ä¾å­˜é…åˆ—ã®å¤‰æ›´ã§å‰¯ä½œç”¨ãŒå†å®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const sideEffect = vi.fn()
+      const { rerender } = renderHook(
+        ({ dependency }) => {
+          // return [useHookName](dependency, sideEffect)
+        },
+        { initialProps: { dependency: 'initial' } }
+      )
+
+      // Assert - åˆå›å®Ÿè¡Œ
+      // expect(sideEffect).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+
+      // Act - ä¾å­˜å€¤ã‚’å¤‰æ›´
+      rerender({ dependency: 'updated' })
+
+      // Assert - å†å®Ÿè¡Œ
+      // expect(sideEffect).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(2)
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆæ™‚ã«ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãŒå®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const cleanup = vi.fn()
+      const { unmount } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]({ cleanup })
+      })
+
+      // Act
+      unmount()
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(cleanup).toHaveBeenCalled()
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('éåŒæœŸå‡¦ç†', () => {
+    it('éåŒæœŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®å–å¾—ãŒæ­£ã—ãå‡¦ç†ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const mockFetch = vi.fn().mockResolvedValue({ data: 'test' })
+      const { result } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]({ fetcher: mockFetch })
+      })
+
+      // Assert - ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ä¸­
+      // expect(result.current.loading).toBe(true)
+
+      // Act & Assert - ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿å–å¾—å®Œäº†
+      await waitFor(() => {
+        // expect(result.current.loading).toBe(false)
+        // expect(result.current.data).toEqual({ data: 'test' })
+      })
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒé©åˆ‡ã«ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const mockFetch = vi.fn().mockRejectedValue(new Error('Failed'))
+      const { result } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]({ fetcher: mockFetch })
+      })
+
+      // Act & Assert
+      await waitFor(() => {
+        // expect(result.current.loading).toBe(false)
+        // expect(result.current.error).toEqual(new Error('Failed'))
+      })
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼å‡¦ç†', () => {
+    beforeEach(() => {
+      vi.useFakeTimers()
+    })
+
+    afterEach(() => {
+      vi.useRealTimers()
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ«ãŒæ­£ã—ãè¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const callback = vi.fn()
+      renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]({ interval: 1000, callback })
+      })
+
+      // Act - æ™‚é–“ã‚’é€²ã‚ã‚‹
+      act(() => {
+        vi.advanceTimersByTime(3000)
+      })
+
+      // Assert
+      // expect(callback).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(3)
+    })
+
+    it('ãƒ‡ãƒã‚¦ãƒ³ã‚¹ãŒæ­£ã—ãå‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const { result } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]({ debounce: 300 })
+      })
+
+      // Act - é€£ç¶šã—ã¦å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—
+      act(() => {
+        // result.current.debouncedFn('a')
+        // result.current.debouncedFn('b')
+        // result.current.debouncedFn('c')
+      })
+
+      // æ™‚é–“ã‚’é€²ã‚ã‚‹
+      act(() => {
+        vi.advanceTimersByTime(300)
+      })
+
+      // Assert - æœ€å¾Œã®å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—ã®ã¿å®Ÿè¡Œ
+      // expect(result.current.value).toBe('c')
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯', () => {
+    it('è¨ˆç®—çµæœãŒæ­£ã—ããƒ¡ãƒ¢åŒ–ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      // Arrange
+      const expensiveComputation = vi.fn((n: number) => n * 2)
+      const { result, rerender } = renderHook(
+        ({ input }) => {
+          // return [useHookName]({ input, compute: expensiveComputation })
+        },
+        { initialProps: { input: 5 } }
+      )
+
+      // Assert - åˆå›è¨ˆç®—
+      // expect(result.current.computed).toBe(10)
+      // expect(expensiveComputation).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+
+      // Act - åŒã˜å…¥åŠ›ã§å†ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
+      rerender({ input: 5 })
+
+      // Assert - å†è¨ˆç®—ã•ã‚Œãªã„
+      // expect(expensiveComputation).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+
+      // Act - ç•°ãªã‚‹å…¥åŠ›
+      rerender({ input: 7 })
+
+      // Assert - å†è¨ˆç®—ã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+      // expect(result.current.computed).toBe(14)
+      // expect(expensiveComputation).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(2)
+    })

+      // Arrange
+      const { result } = renderHook(() => {
+        // return [useHookName]()
+      })

+      act(() => {
+        // result.current.setCondition('A')
+      })
+      // expect(result.current.output).toBe('Result A')
+

+      act(() => {
+        // result.current.setCondition('B')

+      // expect(result.current.output).toBe('Result B')
+    })
+  })

    ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸¶

    feat: å›è»¢æ™‚ã®å£è¹´ã‚Šå‡¦ç†å®Ÿè£…
- Game.rotateãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã«å£è¹´ã‚Šï¼ˆwall kickï¼‰å‡¦ç†ã‚’è¿½åŠ

     const newRotation = (this.currentPair.rotation + 90) % 360
-    if (
-      this.isValidPosition(this.currentPair.x, this.currentPair.y, newRotation)

+    const currentX = this.currentPair.x
+    const currentY = this.currentPair.y
+
+    // ã¾ãšç¾åœ¨ä½ç½®ã§å›è»¢ã‚’è©¦ã¿ã‚‹
+    if (this.isValidPosition(currentX, currentY, newRotation)) {
       this.currentPair.rotate()
       return true
     }
+
+    // å£è¹´ã‚Šå‡¦ç†: å·¦å³ã«ãšã‚‰ã—ã¦å›è»¢ã‚’è©¦ã¿ã‚‹
+    const kickOffsets = [
+      -1, // å·¦ã«ãšã‚‰ã™
+      1, // å³ã«ãšã‚‰ã™
+      -2, // ã•ã‚‰ã«å·¦ã«ãšã‚‰ã™ï¼ˆç«¯ã®å ´åˆï¼‰
+      2, // ã•ã‚‰ã«å³ã«ãšã‚‰ã™ï¼ˆç«¯ã®å ´åˆï¼‰
+    ]
+
+    for (const offset of kickOffsets) {
+      const newX = currentX + offset
+      if (this.isValidPosition(newX, currentY, newRotation)) {
+        this.currentPair.x = newX
+        this.currentPair.rotate()
+        return true
+      }
+    }
+
+    // ã©ã®ä½ç½®ã§ã‚‚å›è»¢ã§ããªã„å ´åˆ
     return false
   }

+# ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆæ¦‚è¦
+
+## æ—¥ç¨‹
+
+- ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³é–‹å§‹æ—¥
+- ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³çµ‚äº†æ—¥
+- ä½œæ¥­æ—¥æ•°

+## è¦å“¡
+
+|åå‰|äºˆå®šä½œæ¥­æ—¥æ•°|å®Ÿç¸¾ä½œæ¥­æ—¥æ•°|
+|---|---|---|
+|A|5|5|
+
+## æŒ‡æ¨™
+
+### ãƒŠã‚¤ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰çµæœ
+
+|æ—¥ä»˜|çµæœ|
+|---|---|
+|9æœˆ1æ—¥(æœˆ) |Build failed|
+
+### ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ³ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³
+
+```mermaid
+xychart-beta
+    title "ãƒªãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ³ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼ãƒˆ"
+    x-axis ["ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³1", "ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³2", "ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³3", "ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³4", "ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³5", "ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³6"]
+    y-axis "æ®‹ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆ" 0 --> 120
+    line [100, 82, 65, 48, 30, 0]
+    line [100, 85, 72, 60, 42, 10]
+```
+
+### ãƒ™ãƒ­ã‚·ãƒ†ã‚£
+
+```mermaid
+xychart-beta
+    title "ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³åˆ¥ãƒ™ãƒ­ã‚·ãƒ†ã‚£"

+    if (!game.nextPair) {
+      return null
+    }

+            className={`puyo ${game.nextPair.sub.color}`}

+    )

+    }

+      this.currentPair = null
+      return
+    }

+  generateNextPair(): void {
+    this.nextPair = this.createRandomPuyoPair(0, 0)
+  }

+      expect(screen.getByText('NEXT')).toBeInTheDocument()
+
+      // NEXTã·ã‚ˆã®ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã¨ã‚µãƒ–ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+      expect(screen.getByTestId('next-main-puyo')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      expect(screen.getByTestId('next-sub-puyo')).toBeInTheDocument()
+
+      // è‰²ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ãŒè¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹
+      const nextMainPuyo = screen.getByTestId('next-main-puyo')
+      const nextSubPuyo = screen.getByTestId('next-sub-puyo')
+      expect(nextMainPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+      expect(nextSubPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+    })
+
+    it('ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—å¾Œã«NEXTã·ã‚ˆãŒç¾åœ¨ã®ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã«ãªã‚‹', () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      const startButton = screen.getByText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹')
+      fireEvent.click(startButton)
+
+      // NEXTã·ã‚ˆã®è‰²ã‚’è¨˜éŒ²
+      const nextMainElement = screen.getByTestId('next-main-puyo')
+      const nextSubElement = screen.getByTestId('next-sub-puyo')
+
+      const nextMainColor = Array.from(nextMainElement.classList).find((cls) =>
+        ['red', 'blue', 'green', 'yellow'].includes(cls)
+      )
+      const nextSubColor = Array.from(nextSubElement.classList).find((cls) =>
+        ['red', 'blue', 'green', 'yellow'].includes(cls)
+      )
+
+      // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œ
+      fireEvent.keyDown(document, { key: ' ' })
+
+      // æ–°ã—ã„ç¾åœ¨ã®ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã®è‰²ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      const currentMainElement = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-1')
+      const currentSubElement = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-0')
+
+      // å…ƒã®NEXTã·ã‚ˆã®è‰²ã¨ä¸€è‡´ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      expect(currentMainElement).toHaveClass(nextMainColor!)
+      expect(currentSubElement).toHaveClass(nextSubColor!)
+
+      // æ–°ã—ã„NEXTã·ã‚ˆãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      expect(screen.getByTestId('next-puyo-area')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      expect(screen.getByTestId('next-main-puyo')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      expect(screen.getByTestId('next-sub-puyo')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+  })
 })

diff --git a/app/src/components/GameBoard.tsx b/app/src/components/GameBoard.tsx
index 5c06e03..045b08a 100644
--- a/app/src/components/GameBoard.tsx
+++ b/app/src/components/GameBoard.tsx
@@ -1,5 +1,6 @@
 import React from 'react'
 import { Game, GameState } from '../domain/Game'
+import { Puyo } from '../domain/Puyo'
 import './GameBoard.css'

 interface GameBoardProps {
@@ -7,34 +8,54 @@ interface GameBoardProps {
 }

 export const GameBoard: React.FC<GameBoardProps> = ({ game }) => {
+  const getFixedPuyoStyle = (puyo: Puyo | null) => {
+    if (puyo) {
+      return { puyoClass: 'puyo', puyoColor: puyo.color }
+    }
+    return null
+  }
+
+  const getCurrentPairStyle = (x: number, y: number) => {
+    if (!game.currentPair || game.state !== GameState.PLAYING) {
+      return null
+    }
+
+    const mainPos = game.currentPair.getMainPosition()
+    const subPos = game.currentPair.getSubPosition()
+
+    if (x === mainPos.x && y === mainPos.y) {
+      return { puyoClass: 'puyo', puyoColor: game.currentPair.main.color }
+    } else if (x === subPos.x && y === subPos.y) {
+      return { puyoClass: 'puyo', puyoColor: game.currentPair.sub.color }
+    }
+
+    return null
+  }
+
+  const getCellStyle = (x: number, y: number) => {
+    const puyo = game.field.getPuyo(x, y)
+
+    // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã«å›ºå®šã•ã‚ŒãŸã·ã‚ˆã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
+    const fixedStyle = getFixedPuyoStyle(puyo)
+    if (fixedStyle) {
+      return fixedStyle
+    }
+
+    // ç¾åœ¨ã®ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
+    const currentStyle = getCurrentPairStyle(x, y)
+    if (currentStyle) {
+      return currentStyle
+    }
+
+    return { puyoClass: '', puyoColor: '' }
+  }
+
   const renderField = () => {
     const cells = []

     for (let y = 0; y < game.field.height; y++) {

diff --git a/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.ts b/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.ts
index 73c696e..e0664ac 100644
--- a/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.ts
+++ b/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.ts
@@ -8,33 +8,39 @@ interface KeyboardHandlers {
   onHardDrop: () => void
 }

+const handleMoveKeys = (key: string, handlers: KeyboardHandlers) => {
+  switch (key) {
+    case 'ArrowLeft':
+      handlers.onMoveLeft()
+      break
+    case 'ArrowRight':
+      handlers.onMoveRight()
+      break
+  }
+}
+
+const handleActionKeys = (key: string, handlers: KeyboardHandlers) => {
+  switch (key) {
+    case 'ArrowUp':
+    case 'z':
+    case 'Z':
+      handlers.onRotate()
+      break
+    case 'ArrowDown':
+      handlers.onDrop()
+      break
+    case ' ': // ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼
+      handlers.onHardDrop()
+      break
+  }
+}
+
 export const useKeyboard = (handlers: KeyboardHandlers) => {
   useEffect(() => {
     const handleKeyDown = (event: KeyboardEvent) => {
-      switch (event.key) {
-        case 'ArrowLeft':
-          event.preventDefault()
-          handlers.onMoveLeft()
-          break
-        case 'ArrowRight':
-          event.preventDefault()
-          handlers.onMoveRight()
-          break
-        case 'ArrowUp':
-        case 'z':
-        case 'Z':
-          event.preventDefault()
-          handlers.onRotate()
-          break
-        case 'ArrowDown':
-          event.preventDefault()
-          handlers.onDrop()
-          break
-        case ' ': // ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼
-          event.preventDefault()
-          handlers.onHardDrop()
-          break
-      }
+      event.preventDefault()
+      handleMoveKeys(event.key, handlers)
+      handleActionKeys(event.key, handlers)
     }

     document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)

     const subPuyo = new Puyo(subColor)

     // åˆæœŸä½ç½®: ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ä¸­å¤®ä¸Šéƒ¨ï¼ˆy=1ã«ã—ã¦subãŒ y=0 ã«é…ç½®ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã™ã‚‹ï¼‰
-    this.currentPair = new PuyoPair(mainPuyo, subPuyo, 2, 1)
+    const newPair = new PuyoPair(mainPuyo, subPuyo, 2, 1)
+
+    // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼åˆ¤å®šï¼šæ–°ã—ã„ãƒšã‚¢ãŒé…ç½®ã§ããªã„å ´åˆ
+    if (!this.canPlacePair(newPair)) {
+      this.state = GameState.GAME_OVER
+      this.currentPair = null
+      return
+    }
+
+    this.currentPair = newPair
+  }
+
+  private canPlacePair(pair: PuyoPair): boolean {
+    const mainPos = pair.getMainPosition()
+    const subPos = pair.getSubPosition()
+
+    // åˆæœŸä½ç½®ã«æ—¢å­˜ã®ã·ã‚ˆãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯é…ç½®ä¸å¯
+    return (
+      this.field.getPuyo(mainPos.x, mainPos.y) === null &&
+      this.field.getPuyo(subPos.x, subPos.y) === null
+    )
   }
 }
diff --git a/app/src/hooks/useAutoDrop.test.ts b/app/src/hooks/useAutoDrop.test.ts
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..7a104ac
--- /dev/null
+++ b/app/src/hooks/useAutoDrop.test.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,112 @@
+import { describe, it, expect, vi, beforeEach, afterEach } from 'vitest'
+import { renderHook } from '@testing-library/react'
+import { useAutoDrop } from './useAutoDrop'
+
+// ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼é–¢æ•°ã‚’ãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯
+vi.useFakeTimers()
+
+describe('useAutoDrop', () => {
+  let mockOnDrop: ReturnType<typeof vi.fn>
+
+  beforeEach(() => {
+    mockOnDrop = vi.fn()
+  })
+
+  afterEach(() => {
+    vi.clearAllTimers()
+    vi.clearAllMocks()
+  })
+
+  describe('è‡ªå‹•è½ä¸‹ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ', () => {
+    it('æœ‰åŠ¹æ™‚ã«æŒ‡å®šé–“éš”ã§ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      renderHook(() =>
+        useAutoDrop({
+          onDrop: mockOnDrop,
+          interval: 1000,
+          enabled: true,
+        })
+      )
+
+      // 1ç§’å¾Œã«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      expect(mockOnDrop).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+
+      // ã•ã‚‰ã«1ç§’å¾Œã«ã‚‚ã†ä¸€åº¦å‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      expect(mockOnDrop).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(2)
+    })
+
+    it('ç„¡åŠ¹æ™‚ã¯ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œãªã„', () => {
+      renderHook(() =>
+        useAutoDrop({
+          onDrop: mockOnDrop,
+          interval: 1000,
+          enabled: false,
+        })
+      )
+
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(2000)
+      expect(mockOnDrop).not.toHaveBeenCalled()
+    })
+
+    it('enabledãŒfalseã‹ã‚‰trueã«å¤‰ã‚ã‚‹ã¨è‡ªå‹•è½ä¸‹ãŒé–‹å§‹ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      const { rerender } = renderHook(
+        ({ enabled }) =>
+          useAutoDrop({
+            onDrop: mockOnDrop,
+            interval: 1000,
+            enabled,
+          }),
+        { initialProps: { enabled: false } }
+      )
+
+      // æœ€åˆã¯å‘¼ã°ã‚Œãªã„
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      expect(mockOnDrop).not.toHaveBeenCalled()
+
+      // enabledã‚’trueã«å¤‰æ›´
+      rerender({ enabled: true })
+
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      expect(mockOnDrop).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+    })
+
+    it('enabledãŒtrueã‹ã‚‰falseã«å¤‰ã‚ã‚‹ã¨è‡ªå‹•è½ä¸‹ãŒåœæ­¢ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      const { rerender } = renderHook(
+        ({ enabled }) =>
+          useAutoDrop({
+            onDrop: mockOnDrop,
+            interval: 1000,
+            enabled,
+          }),
+        { initialProps: { enabled: true } }
+      )
+
+      // æœ€åˆã¯å‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      expect(mockOnDrop).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+
+      // enabledã‚’falseã«å¤‰æ›´
+      rerender({ enabled: false })
+
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      expect(mockOnDrop).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1) // å¢—åŠ ã—ãªã„
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆæ™‚ã«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ãŒã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢ã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      const { unmount } = renderHook(() =>
+        useAutoDrop({
+          onDrop: mockOnDrop,
+          interval: 1000,
+          enabled: true,
+        })
+      )
+
+      unmount()
+
+      // ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆå¾Œã«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ãŒé€²ã‚“ã§ã‚‚ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã¯å‘¼ã°ã‚Œãªã„
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      expect(mockOnDrop).not.toHaveBeenCalled()
+    })
+  })
+})
diff --git a/app/src/hooks/useAutoDrop.ts b/app/src/hooks/useAutoDrop.ts
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..406894a
--- /dev/null
+++ b/app/src/hooks/useAutoDrop.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'
+
+interface UseAutoDropOptions {
+  onDrop: () => void
+  interval: number
+  enabled: boolean
+}
+
+export const useAutoDrop = ({
+  onDrop,
+  interval,
+  enabled,
+}: UseAutoDropOptions) => {
+  const intervalRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null)
+  const onDropRef = useRef(onDrop)
+
+  // ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’æœ€æ–°ã«ä¿ã¤
+  useEffect(() => {
+    onDropRef.current = onDrop
+  }, [onDrop])
+
+  useEffect(() => {
+    if (enabled) {
+      intervalRef.current = setInterval(() => {
+        onDropRef.current()
+      }, interval)
+    } else {
+      if (intervalRef.current) {
+        clearInterval(intervalRef.current)
+        intervalRef.current = null
+      }
+    }
+
+    return () => {
+      if (intervalRef.current) {
+        clearInterval(intervalRef.current)
+        intervalRef.current = null
+      }
+    }
+  }, [enabled, interval])
+}
diff --git a/app/src/integration/AutoDropIntegration.test.tsx b/app/src/integration/AutoDropIntegration.test.tsx
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..ce41bcd
--- /dev/null
+++ b/app/src/integration/AutoDropIntegration.test.tsx
@@ -0,0 +1,95 @@
+import { describe, it, expect, vi, beforeEach, afterEach } from 'vitest'
+import { render, screen, fireEvent, act } from '@testing-library/react'
+import App from '../App'
+
+// ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼é–¢æ•°ã‚’ãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯
+vi.useFakeTimers()
+
+describe('Auto Drop Integration', () => {
+  beforeEach(() => {
+    vi.clearAllTimers()
+  })
+
+  afterEach(() => {
+    vi.runOnlyPendingTimers()
+    vi.useRealTimers()
+    vi.useFakeTimers()
+  })
+
+  describe('è‡ªå‹•è½ä¸‹ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ã®çµ±åˆãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ', () => {
+    it('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹å¾Œã«è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«ã·ã‚ˆãŒè½ä¸‹ã™ã‚‹', async () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+      const startButton = screen.getByText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹')
+      fireEvent.click(startButton)
+
+      // åˆæœŸä½ç½®ã®ã·ã‚ˆã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      const initialPuyo = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-1')
+      expect(initialPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+
+      // 1ç§’çµŒé
+      await act(async () => {
+        vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      })
+
+      // ã·ã‚ˆãŒä¸‹ã«ç§»å‹•ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      const droppedPuyo = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-2')
+      expect(droppedPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ åœæ­¢ä¸­ã¯è‡ªå‹•è½ä¸‹ã—ãªã„', () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹å‰ã®çŠ¶æ…‹
+      expect(screen.getByText('Ready')).toBeInTheDocument()
+
+      // æ™‚é–“ã‚’é€²ã‚ã‚‹
+      vi.advanceTimersByTime(2000)
+
+      // ä½•ã‚‚å¤‰åŒ–ã—ãªã„ï¼ˆReadyçŠ¶æ…‹ã®ã¾ã¾ï¼‰
+      expect(screen.getByText('Ready')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+
+    it('åº•ã¾ã§è½ä¸‹ã™ã‚‹ã¨æ–°ã—ã„ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã‚‹', async () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+      const startButton = screen.getByText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹')
+      fireEvent.click(startButton)
+
+      // ååˆ†ãªæ™‚é–“ã‚’çµŒéã•ã›ã¦åº•ã¾ã§è½ä¸‹
+      await act(async () => {
+        vi.advanceTimersByTime(15000) // 15ç§’
+      })
+
+      // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰åº•éƒ¨ã«ã·ã‚ˆãŒå›ºå®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      const bottomPuyo = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-11')
+      expect(bottomPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+
+      // æ–°ã—ã„ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ãŒä¸Šéƒ¨ã«ç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      const newPuyo = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-1')
+      expect(newPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+    })
+
+    it('æ‰‹å‹•è½ä¸‹ã¨è‡ªå‹•è½ä¸‹ãŒä½µç”¨ã§ãã‚‹', async () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+      const startButton = screen.getByText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹')
+      fireEvent.click(startButton)
+
+      // æ‰‹å‹•ã§ä¸‹ã«ç§»å‹•
+      fireEvent.keyDown(document, { key: 'ArrowDown' })

+      // ã•ã‚‰ã«è‡ªå‹•è½ä¸‹ã§ä¸‹ã«ç§»å‹•
+      await act(async () => {
+        vi.advanceTimersByTime(1000)
+      })

diff --git a/app/src/App.tsx b/app/src/App.tsx
index 4a09b7c..bfcb581 100644
--- a/app/src/App.tsx
+++ b/app/src/App.tsx
@@ -1,6 +1,68 @@
+import { useState, useCallback } from 'react'
 import './App.css'
+import { GameBoard } from './components/GameBoard'
+import { Game, GameState } from './domain/Game'
+import { useKeyboard } from './hooks/useKeyboard'

 function App() {
+  const [game] = useState(() => new Game())
+  const [renderKey, setRenderKey] = useState(0)
+
+  const forceRender = useCallback(() => {
+    setRenderKey((prev) => prev + 1)
+  }, [])
+
+  const handleStartGame = () => {
+    game.start()
+    forceRender()
+  }
+
+  // ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰æ“ä½œã®ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒ¼
+  const keyboardHandlers = {
+    onMoveLeft: useCallback(() => {
+      if (game.state === GameState.PLAYING) {
+        game.moveLeft()
+        forceRender()
+      }
+    }, [game, forceRender]),
+    onMoveRight: useCallback(() => {
+      if (game.state === GameState.PLAYING) {
+        game.moveRight()
+        forceRender()
+      }
+    }, [game, forceRender]),
+    onRotate: useCallback(() => {
+      if (game.state === GameState.PLAYING) {
+        game.rotate()
+        forceRender()
+      }
+    }, [game, forceRender]),
+    onDrop: useCallback(() => {
+      if (game.state === GameState.PLAYING) {
+        const dropped = game.drop()
+        if (!dropped) {
+          // ã“ã‚Œä»¥ä¸Šè½ä¸‹ã§ããªã„å ´åˆã€ã·ã‚ˆã‚’å›ºå®š
+          game.fixCurrentPair()
+        }
+        forceRender()
+      }
+    }, [game, forceRender]),
+    onHardDrop: useCallback(() => {
+      if (game.state === GameState.PLAYING) {
+        // è½ã¡ã‚‹ã¨ã“ã‚ã¾ã§ä¸€æ°—ã«è½ä¸‹
+        while (game.drop()) {
+          // è½ä¸‹ã—ç¶šã‘ã‚‹
+        }
+        // å›ºå®š
+        game.fixCurrentPair()
+        forceRender()
+      }
+    }, [game, forceRender])
+  }
+
+  // ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ç™»éŒ²
+  useKeyboard(keyboardHandlers)
+
   return (
     <div className="app">
       <header className="app-header">
@@ -9,7 +71,19 @@ function App() {
       </header>
       <main className="app-main">
         <div className="game-container">
-          <p>ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’æº–å‚™ä¸­...</p>
+          <GameBoard key={renderKey} game={game} />
+          <div className="controls">
+            <button onClick={handleStartGame}>ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹</button>
+          </div>
+          <div className="instructions">
+            <h3>æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³•</h3>
+            <div className="key-instructions">
+              <div>â†â†’: ç§»å‹•</div>
+              <div>â†‘/Z: å›è»¢</div>
+              <div>â†“: é«˜é€Ÿè½ä¸‹</div>
+              <div>ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹: ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—</div>
+            </div>
+          </div>
         </div>
       </main>
     </div>

+.game-board {
+  display: flex;
+  flex-direction: column;
+  align-items: center;
+  gap: 1rem;
+  padding: 1rem;
+}
+
+.game-status {
+  display: flex;
+  justify-content: space-between;
+  gap: 2rem;
+  font-size: 1.2rem;
+  font-weight: bold;
+  color: #333;
+  min-width: 300px;
+}
+
+.field {
+  display: grid;
+  grid-template-columns: repeat(6, 1fr);
+  grid-template-rows: repeat(12, 1fr);
+  gap: 1px;
+  border: 2px solid #333;
+  background-color: #333;
+  padding: 4px;
+}

+.cell {
+  width: 32px;
+  height: 32px;
+  background-color: #f0f0f0;
+  border: 1px solid #ddd;
+  display: flex;
+  align-items: center;
+  justify-content: center;
+  transition: all 0.1s ease;
+}
+
+/* ã·ã‚ˆã®è‰²ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒªãƒ³ã‚° */
+.cell.puyo {
+  border-radius: 50%;
+  border: 2px solid #fff;
+  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
+}
+
+.cell.puyo.red {
+  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b 0%, #ee5a52 100%);
+}
+
+.cell.puyo.blue {
+  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4ecdc4 0%, #44a08d 100%);
+}
+
+.cell.puyo.green {
+  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #95e1d3 0%, #5fb3a3 100%);
+}
+
+.cell.puyo.yellow {
+  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd93d 0%, #ff9f43 100%);
+}
+
+/* ãƒ›ãƒãƒ¼åŠ¹æœï¼ˆãƒ‡ãƒãƒƒã‚°ç”¨ï¼‰ */
+.cell:hover:not(.puyo) {
+  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
+}
diff --git a/app/src/components/GameBoard.test.tsx b/app/src/components/GameBoard.test.tsx
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..ae1a0d3

+++ b/app/src/components/GameBoard.test.tsx

+import { describe, it, expect } from 'vitest'
+import { render, screen } from '@testing-library/react'
+import { GameBoard } from './GameBoard'
+import { Game } from '../domain/Game'
+
+describe('GameBoard', () => {
+  describe('GameBoardã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹', () => {
+    it('GameBoardã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+
+      render(<GameBoard game={game} />)
+
+      const gameboard = screen.getByTestId('game-board')
+      expect(gameboard).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+
+    it('ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã®ãƒã‚¹ç›®ãŒæ­£ã—ãè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+
+      render(<GameBoard game={game} />)
+
+      // 12x6 = 72å€‹ã®ã‚»ãƒ«ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹
+      const cells = screen.getAllByTestId(/^cell-/)
+      expect(cells).toHaveLength(72)
+    })
+
+    it('ç©ºã®ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+
+      render(<GameBoard game={game} />)
+
+      // ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ã‚»ãƒ«ãŒç©ºã§ã‚ã‚‹
+      const emptyCells = screen
+        .getAllByTestId(/^cell-/)
+        .filter((cell) => !cell.classList.contains('puyo'))
+      expect(emptyCells).toHaveLength(72)
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ çŠ¶æ…‹ã®è¡¨ç¤º', () => {
+    it('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹å‰ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+
+      render(<GameBoard game={game} />)
+
+      expect(screen.getByText('Ready')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ä¸­ã®ç¾åœ¨ã®ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+      game.start()
+
+      render(<GameBoard game={game} />)
+
+      expect(screen.getByText('Playing')).toBeInTheDocument()
+
+      // ç¾åœ¨ã®ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ï¼ˆmain puyoï¼‰
+      const mainPuyoCell = screen.getByTestId(
+        `cell-${game.currentPair!.x}-${game.currentPair!.y}`
+      )
+      expect(mainPuyoCell).toHaveClass('puyo')
+
+      // sub puyoã‚‚è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+      const subPos = game.currentPair!.getSubPosition()
+      const subPuyoCell = screen.getByTestId(`cell-${subPos.x}-${subPos.y}`)
+      expect(subPuyoCell).toHaveClass('puyo')
+    })
+  })
+})
diff --git a/app/src/components/GameBoard.tsx b/app/src/components/GameBoard.tsx
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..5c06e03
--- /dev/null
+++ b/app/src/components/GameBoard.tsx
@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@
+import React from 'react'
+import { Game, GameState } from '../domain/Game'
+import './GameBoard.css'
+
+interface GameBoardProps {
+  game: Game
+}
+
+export const GameBoard: React.FC<GameBoardProps> = ({ game }) => {
+  const renderField = () => {
+    const cells = []
+
+    for (let y = 0; y < game.field.height; y++) {
+      for (let x = 0; x < game.field.width; x++) {
+        const puyo = game.field.getPuyo(x, y)
+        let puyoClass = ''
+        let puyoColor = ''
+
+        // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã«å›ºå®šã•ã‚ŒãŸã·ã‚ˆã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
+        if (puyo) {
+          puyoClass = 'puyo'
+          puyoColor = puyo.color
+        }
+
+        // ç¾åœ¨ã®ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
+        if (game.currentPair && game.state === GameState.PLAYING) {
+          const mainPos = game.currentPair.getMainPosition()
+          const subPos = game.currentPair.getSubPosition()
+
+          if (x === mainPos.x && y === mainPos.y) {
+            puyoClass = 'puyo'
+            puyoColor = game.currentPair.main.color
+          } else if (x === subPos.x && y === subPos.y) {
+            puyoClass = 'puyo'
+            puyoColor = game.currentPair.sub.color
+          }
+        }
+
+        cells.push(
+          <div
+            key={`${x}-${y}`}
+            data-testid={`cell-${x}-${y}`}
+            className={`cell ${puyoClass} ${puyoColor}`}
+          />
+        )
+      }
+    }
+
+    return cells
+  }
+
+  const getGameStateText = () => {
+    switch (game.state) {
+      case GameState.READY:
+        return 'Ready'
+      case GameState.PLAYING:
+        return 'Playing'
+      case GameState.GAME_OVER:
+        return 'Game Over'
+      default:
+        return ''
+    }
+  }
+
+  return (
+    <div data-testid="game-board" className="game-board">
+      <div className="game-status">
+        <span>{getGameStateText()}</span>
+        <span>Score: {game.score}</span>
+      </div>
+      <div className="field">{renderField()}</div>
+    </div>
+  )
+}
+
+export default GameBoard
diff --git a/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.test.ts b/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.test.ts
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..5fd7caf
--- /dev/null
+++ b/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.test.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
+import { describe, it, expect, vi, beforeEach, afterEach } from 'vitest'
+import { renderHook } from '@testing-library/react'
+import { useKeyboard } from './useKeyboard'
+
+describe('useKeyboard', () => {
+  let mockHandlers: {
+    onMoveLeft: ReturnType<typeof vi.fn>
+    onMoveRight: ReturnType<typeof vi.fn>
+    onRotate: ReturnType<typeof vi.fn>
+    onDrop: ReturnType<typeof vi.fn>
+    onHardDrop: ReturnType<typeof vi.fn>
+  }
+
+  beforeEach(() => {
+    mockHandlers = {
+      onMoveLeft: vi.fn(),
+      onMoveRight: vi.fn(),
+      onRotate: vi.fn(),
+      onDrop: vi.fn(),
+      onHardDrop: vi.fn(),
+    }
+  })
+
+  afterEach(() => {
+    vi.clearAllMocks()
+  })
+
+  describe('ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆã®å‡¦ç†', () => {
+    it('å·¦çŸ¢å°ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§å·¦ç§»å‹•ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      renderHook(() => useKeyboard(mockHandlers))
+
+      const event = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'ArrowLeft' })
+      document.dispatchEvent(event)
+
+      expect(mockHandlers.onMoveLeft).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+    })
+
+    it('å³çŸ¢å°ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§å³ç§»å‹•ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      renderHook(() => useKeyboard(mockHandlers))
+
+      const event = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'ArrowRight' })
+      document.dispatchEvent(event)
+
+      expect(mockHandlers.onMoveRight).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+    })
+
+    it('ä¸ŠçŸ¢å°ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§å›è»¢ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      renderHook(() => useKeyboard(mockHandlers))
+
+      const event = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'ArrowUp' })
+      document.dispatchEvent(event)
+
+      expect(mockHandlers.onRotate).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+    })
+
+    it('Zã‚­ãƒ¼ã§å›è»¢ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      renderHook(() => useKeyboard(mockHandlers))
+
+      const event = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'z' })
+      document.dispatchEvent(event)
+
+      expect(mockHandlers.onRotate).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+    })
+
+    it('ä¸‹çŸ¢å°ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§è½ä¸‹ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      renderHook(() => useKeyboard(mockHandlers))
+
+      const event = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'ArrowDown' })
+      document.dispatchEvent(event)
+
+      expect(mockHandlers.onDrop).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      renderHook(() => useKeyboard(mockHandlers))
+
+      const event = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: ' ' })
+      document.dispatchEvent(event)
+
+      expect(mockHandlers.onHardDrop).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1)
+    })
+
+    it('æœªå®šç¾©ã®ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ã¯ä½•ã‚‚å‘¼ã°ã‚Œãªã„', () => {
+      renderHook(() => useKeyboard(mockHandlers))
+
+      const event = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'a' })
+      document.dispatchEvent(event)
+
+      expect(mockHandlers.onMoveLeft).not.toHaveBeenCalled()
+      expect(mockHandlers.onMoveRight).not.toHaveBeenCalled()
+      expect(mockHandlers.onRotate).not.toHaveBeenCalled()
+      expect(mockHandlers.onDrop).not.toHaveBeenCalled()
+      expect(mockHandlers.onHardDrop).not.toHaveBeenCalled()
+    })
+  })
+})
diff --git a/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.ts b/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.ts
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..73c696e
--- /dev/null
+++ b/app/src/hooks/useKeyboard.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,46 @@
+import { useEffect } from 'react'
+
+interface KeyboardHandlers {
+  onMoveLeft: () => void
+  onMoveRight: () => void
+  onRotate: () => void
+  onDrop: () => void
+  onHardDrop: () => void
+}
+
+export const useKeyboard = (handlers: KeyboardHandlers) => {
+  useEffect(() => {
+    const handleKeyDown = (event: KeyboardEvent) => {
+      switch (event.key) {
+        case 'ArrowLeft':
+          event.preventDefault()
+          handlers.onMoveLeft()
+          break
+        case 'ArrowRight':
+          event.preventDefault()
+          handlers.onMoveRight()
+          break
+        case 'ArrowUp':
+        case 'z':
+        case 'Z':
+          event.preventDefault()
+          handlers.onRotate()
+          break
+        case 'ArrowDown':
+          event.preventDefault()
+          handlers.onDrop()
+          break
+        case ' ': // ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼
+          event.preventDefault()
+          handlers.onHardDrop()
+          break
+      }
+    }
+
+    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)
+
+    return () => {
+      document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)
+    }
+  }, [handlers])
+}
diff --git a/app/src/integration/GameIntegration.test.tsx b/app/src/integration/GameIntegration.test.tsx
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..e2c0914
--- /dev/null
+++ b/app/src/integration/GameIntegration.test.tsx

+import { describe, it, expect } from 'vitest'
+import { render, screen, fireEvent } from '@testing-library/react'
+import App from '../App'
+
+describe('Game Integration', () => {
+  describe('åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ æ“ä½œã®çµ±åˆãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ', () => {
+    it('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹å¾Œã«ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã·ã‚ˆã‚’æ“ä½œã§ãã‚‹', async () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+      const startButton = screen.getByText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹')
+      fireEvent.click(startButton)
+
+      // PlayingçŠ¶æ…‹ã«ãªã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      expect(screen.getByText('Playing')).toBeInTheDocument()
+
+      // ç¾åœ¨ã®ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã®ä½ç½®ã‚’å–å¾—
+      const currentPuyoMain = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-1')
+      expect(currentPuyoMain).toHaveClass('puyo')
+
+      // å·¦ç§»å‹•ã‚­ãƒ¼ã‚’æŠ¼ã™
+      fireEvent.keyDown(document, { key: 'ArrowLeft' })
+
+      // ã·ã‚ˆãŒå·¦ã«ç§»å‹•ã—ãŸã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      const movedPuyoMain = screen.getByTestId('cell-1-1')
+      expect(movedPuyoMain).toHaveClass('puyo')
+
+      // mainã®ä½ç½®ãŒç§»å‹•ã—ãŸã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      expect(movedPuyoMain).toHaveClass('puyo')
+    })
+
+    it('å›è»¢ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’å›è»¢ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+      const startButton = screen.getByText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹')
+      fireEvent.click(startButton)
+
+      // Zã‚­ãƒ¼ã§å›è»¢
+      fireEvent.keyDown(document, { key: 'z' })
+
+      // å›è»¢å¾Œã®ä½ç½®ã«ã·ã‚ˆãŒã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèªï¼ˆå›è»¢å¾Œã¯sub puyoãŒå³ã«ç§»å‹•ï¼‰
+      const rotatedSubPuyo = screen.getByTestId('cell-3-1')
+      expect(rotatedSubPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+    })
+
+    it('ä¸‹çŸ¢å°ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§é«˜é€Ÿè½ä¸‹ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+      const startButton = screen.getByText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹')
+      fireEvent.click(startButton)
+
+      // ä¸‹çŸ¢å°ã‚­ãƒ¼ã‚’æŠ¼ã™
+      fireEvent.keyDown(document, { key: 'ArrowDown' })
+
+      // ã·ã‚ˆãŒä¸‹ã«ç§»å‹•ã—ãŸã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      const droppedPuyo = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-2')
+      expect(droppedPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+    })
+
+    it('ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      // ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹
+      const startButton = screen.getByText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹å§‹')
+      fireEvent.click(startButton)
+
+      // ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—
+      fireEvent.keyDown(document, { key: ' ' })
+
+      // æ–°ã—ã„ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèªï¼ˆå‰ã®ã·ã‚ˆã¯åº•ã¾ã§è½ã¡ã¦å›ºå®šæ¸ˆã¿ï¼‰
+      // æ–°ã—ã„ãƒšã‚¢ã¯åˆæœŸä½ç½®(2,1)ã«ç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+      const newPuyoPair = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-1')
+      expect(newPuyoPair).toHaveClass('puyo')
+
+      // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰åº•éƒ¨ã«å‰ã®ã·ã‚ˆãŒå›ºå®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèª
+      // åº•ã¯11è¡Œç›®ãªã®ã§ã€main puyoã¯(2,11)ã€sub puyoã¯(2,10)ã«å›ºå®šã•ã‚Œã‚‹
+      const fixedMainPuyo = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-11')
+      expect(fixedMainPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+
+      const fixedSubPuyo = screen.getByTestId('cell-2-10')
+      expect(fixedSubPuyo).toHaveClass('puyo')
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³•ã®è¡¨ç¤º', () => {
+    it('ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰æ“ä½œã®èª¬æ˜ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      render(<App />)
+
+      expect(screen.getByText('æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³•')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      expect(screen.getByText('â†â†’: ç§»å‹•')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      expect(screen.getByText('â†‘/Z: å›è»¢')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      expect(screen.getByText('â†“: é«˜é€Ÿè½ä¸‹')).toBeInTheDocument()
+      expect(screen.getByText('ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹: ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—')).toBeInTheDocument()
+    })
+  })
+})

    ã‚³ãƒŸãƒƒãƒˆ: 2197f6b¶

    ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸¶

    feat: ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«å±¤ã®å®Œæˆ
- Gameã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã®å®Ÿè£…å®Œäº†
  - ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã®ç§»å‹•ã€å›è»¢ã€è½ä¸‹æ©Ÿèƒ½
  - ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã®å›ºå®šã¨æ–°ãƒšã‚¢ç”Ÿæˆæ©Ÿèƒ½
  - ä½ç½®æ¤œè¨¼ã¨è¡çªåˆ¤å®šæ©Ÿèƒ½
- è¤‡é›‘åº¦ãƒªãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ï¼ˆisValidPositionåˆ†å‰²ï¼‰

+import { describe, it, expect } from 'vitest'
+import { Game, GameState } from './Game'
+import { PuyoColor } from './Puyo'
+
+describe('Game', () => {
+  describe('Gameã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹', () => {
+    it('æ–°ã—ã„ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’ä½œæˆã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+
+      expect(game.state).toBe(GameState.READY)
+      expect(game.score).toBe(0)
+      expect(game.field).toBeDefined()
+      expect(game.field.isEmpty()).toBe(true)
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’é–‹å§‹ã™ã‚‹', () => {
+    it('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’é–‹å§‹ã™ã‚‹ã¨çŠ¶æ…‹ãŒPLAYINGã«ãªã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+
+      game.start()
+
+      expect(game.state).toBe(GameState.PLAYING)
+      expect(game.currentPair).toBeDefined()
+    })
+
+    it('é–‹å§‹æ™‚ã«æœ€åˆã®ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+
+      game.start()
+
+      expect(game.currentPair).not.toBeNull()
+      expect(game.currentPair!.main.color).toBeOneOf([
+        PuyoColor.RED,
+        PuyoColor.BLUE,
+        PuyoColor.GREEN,
+        PuyoColor.YELLOW,
+      ])
+      expect(game.currentPair!.sub.color).toBeOneOf([
+        PuyoColor.RED,
+        PuyoColor.BLUE,
+        PuyoColor.GREEN,
+        PuyoColor.YELLOW,
+      ])
+    })
+
+    it('åˆæœŸä½ç½®ãŒä¸­å¤®ä¸Šéƒ¨ã«è¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+
+      game.start()
+
+      expect(game.currentPair!.x).toBe(2)
+      expect(game.currentPair!.y).toBe(1)
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’æ“ä½œã™ã‚‹', () => {
+    it('ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’å·¦ã«ç§»å‹•ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+      game.start()
+      const initialX = game.currentPair!.x
+
+      const moved = game.moveLeft()
+
+      expect(moved).toBe(true)
+      expect(game.currentPair!.x).toBe(initialX - 1)
+    })
+
+    it('ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’å³ã«ç§»å‹•ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+      game.start()
+      const initialX = game.currentPair!.x
+
+      const moved = game.moveRight()
+
+      expect(moved).toBe(true)
+      expect(game.currentPair!.x).toBe(initialX + 1)
+    })
+
+    it('ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’å›è»¢ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+      game.start()
+
+      game.rotate()
+
+      expect(game.currentPair!.rotation).toBe(90)
+    })
+
+    it('ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’ä¸‹ã«è½ä¸‹ã§ãã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+      game.start()
+      const initialY = game.currentPair!.y
+
+      const dropped = game.drop()
+
+      expect(dropped).toBe(true)
+      expect(game.currentPair!.y).toBe(initialY + 1)
+    })
+
+    it('å¢ƒç•Œã‚’è¶…ãˆã¦ç§»å‹•ã—ã‚ˆã†ã¨ã™ã‚‹ã¨å¤±æ•—ã™ã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+      game.start()
+
+      // å·¦ç«¯ã¾ã§ç§»å‹•
+      game.moveLeft()
+      game.moveLeft()
+      const leftmost = game.moveLeft()
+
+      expect(leftmost).toBe(false)
+      expect(game.currentPair!.x).toBe(0)
+    })
+  })
+
+  describe('ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã®å›ºå®šã¨æ–°ãƒšã‚¢ç”Ÿæˆ', () => {
+    it('ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ãŒåº•ã«åˆ°é”ã™ã‚‹ã¨å›ºå®šã•ã‚Œæ–°ã—ã„ãƒšã‚¢ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã‚‹', () => {
+      const game = new Game()
+      game.start()
+      const originalPair = game.currentPair!
+
+      // åº•ã¾ã§è½ä¸‹ã•ã›ã‚‹
+      while (game.drop()) {
+        // è½ä¸‹ã—ç¶šã‘ã‚‹
+      }
+
+      // ã·ã‚ˆãƒšã‚¢ã‚’å›ºå®šã—æ–°ã—ã„ãƒšã‚¢ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
+      game.fixCurrentPair()
+
+      // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã«ã·ã‚ˆãŒå›ºå®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹
+      const mainPos = originalPair.getMainPosition()
+      const subPos = originalPair.getSubPosition()
+      expect(game.field.getPuyo(mainPos.x, mainPos.y)).not.toBeNull()
+      expect(game.field.getPuyo(subPos.x, subPos.y)).not.toBeNull()
+
+      // æ–°ã—ã„ãƒšã‚¢ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹
+      expect(game.currentPair).not.toBeNull()
+      expect(game.currentPair).not.toBe(originalPair)
+      expect(game.currentPair!.x).toBe(2)
+      expect(game.currentPair!.y).toBe(1)
+    })
+  })
+})
diff --git a/app/src/domain/Game.ts b/app/src/domain/Game.ts
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..e99ccef
--- /dev/null
+++ b/app/src/domain/Game.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,152 @@
+import { Field } from './Field'
+import { PuyoPair } from './PuyoPair'
+import { Puyo, PuyoColor } from './Puyo'
+
+export enum GameState {
+  READY = 'ready',
+  PLAYING = 'playing',
+  GAME_OVER = 'game_over',
+}
+
+export class Game {
+  public state: GameState = GameState.READY
+  public score: number = 0
+  public field: Field
+  public currentPair: PuyoPair | null = null
+
+  constructor() {
+    this.field = new Field()
+  }
+
+  start(): void {
+    this.state = GameState.PLAYING
+    this.generateNewPair()
+  }
+
+  moveLeft(): boolean {
+    if (!this.currentPair || this.state !== GameState.PLAYING) {
+      return false
+    }
+
+    const newX = this.currentPair.x - 1
+    if (
+      this.isValidPosition(newX, this.currentPair.y, this.currentPair.rotation)
+    ) {
+      this.currentPair.x = newX
+      return true
+    }
+    return false
+  }
+
+  moveRight(): boolean {
+    if (!this.currentPair || this.state !== GameState.PLAYING) {
+      return false
+    }
+
+    const newX = this.currentPair.x + 1
+    if (
+      this.isValidPosition(newX, this.currentPair.y, this.currentPair.rotation)
+    ) {
+      this.currentPair.x = newX
+      return true
+    }
+    return false
+  }
+
+  rotate(): boolean {
+    if (!this.currentPair || this.state !== GameState.PLAYING) {
+      return false
+    }
+
+    const newRotation = (this.currentPair.rotation + 90) % 360
+    if (
+      this.isValidPosition(this.currentPair.x, this.currentPair.y, newRotation)
+    ) {
+      this.currentPair.rotate()
+      return true
+    }
+    return false
+  }
+
+  drop(): boolean {
+    if (!this.currentPair || this.state !== GameState.PLAYING) {
+      return false
+    }
+
+    const newY = this.currentPair.y + 1
+    if (
+      this.isValidPosition(this.currentPair.x, newY, this.currentPair.rotation)
+    ) {
+      this.currentPair.y = newY
+      return true
+    }
+    return false
+  }
+
+  fixCurrentPair(): void {
+    if (!this.currentPair) {
+      return
+    }
+
+    const mainPos = this.currentPair.getMainPosition()
+    const subPos = this.currentPair.getSubPosition()
+
+    // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã«ã·ã‚ˆã‚’é…ç½®
+    this.field.setPuyo(mainPos.x, mainPos.y, this.currentPair.main)
+    this.field.setPuyo(subPos.x, subPos.y, this.currentPair.sub)
+
+    // æ–°ã—ã„ãƒšã‚¢ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
+    this.generateNewPair()
+  }
+
+  private isValidPosition(x: number, y: number, rotation: number): boolean {
+    // ä»®ã®PuyoPairã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¦ä½ç½®ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
+    const tempPair = new PuyoPair(
+      this.currentPair!.main,
+      this.currentPair!.sub,
+      x,
+      y
+    )
+    tempPair.rotation = rotation
+
+    const mainPos = tempPair.getMainPosition()
+    const subPos = tempPair.getSubPosition()
+
+    return (
+      this.isWithinFieldBounds(mainPos) &&
+      this.isWithinFieldBounds(subPos) &&
+      this.isPositionEmpty(mainPos) &&
+      this.isPositionEmpty(subPos)
+    )
+  }
+
+  private isWithinFieldBounds(position: { x: number; y: number }): boolean {
+    return (
+      position.x >= 0 &&
+      position.x < this.field.width &&
+      position.y >= 0 &&
+      position.y < this.field.height
+    )
+  }
+
+  private isPositionEmpty(position: { x: number; y: number }): boolean {
+    return this.field.getPuyo(position.x, position.y) === null
+  }
+
+  private generateNewPair(): void {
+    const colors = [
+      PuyoColor.RED,
+      PuyoColor.BLUE,
+      PuyoColor.GREEN,
+      PuyoColor.YELLOW,
+    ]
+    const mainColor = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)]
+    const subColor = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)]
+
+    const mainPuyo = new Puyo(mainColor)
+    const subPuyo = new Puyo(subColor)
+
+    // åˆæœŸä½ç½®: ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ä¸­å¤®ä¸Šéƒ¨ï¼ˆy=1ã«ã—ã¦subãŒ y=0 ã«é…ç½®ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã™ã‚‹ï¼‰
+    this.currentPair = new PuyoPair(mainPuyo, subPuyo, 2, 1)
+  }
+}

new file mode 100644
index 0000000..9eba232

+++ b/app/src/test/matchers.d.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+declare module 'vitest' {
+  interface Assertion {
+    toBeOneOf(items: unknown[]): void
+  }
+}
diff --git a/app/src/test/setup.ts b/app/src/test/setup.ts
index 2781a29..5fec8e9 100644
--- a/app/src/test/setup.ts
+++ b/app/src/test/setup.ts
@@ -1,4 +1,18 @@
 import '@testing-library/jest-dom'
+import { expect } from 'vitest'
+
+expect.extend({
+  toBeOneOf(received: unknown, items: unknown[]) {
+    const pass = items.includes(received)
+    return {
+      pass,
+      message: () =>
+        pass
+          ? `expected ${received} not to be one of [${items.join(', ')}]`
+          : `expected ${received} to be one of [${items.join(', ')}]`,
+    }
+  },
+})

 // Mock matchMedia for tests
 Object.defineProperty(window, 'matchMedia', {

     "paths": {
       "@/*": ["src/*"]
-    }
+    },

+    /* Test types */
+    "types": ["vitest/globals"]
   },
   "include": ["src"],
+  "exclude": ["**/*.test.ts", "**/*.test.tsx", "src/test/**"],
   "references": [{ "path": "./tsconfig.node.json" }]
 }

    ã‚³ãƒŸãƒƒãƒˆ: 2dc895f¶

- 2ã¤ã®ã·ã‚ˆï¼ˆmain/subï¼‰ã‚’ç®¡ç†ã™ã‚‹ãƒšã‚¢ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹
- æ™‚è¨ˆå›ã‚Š90åº¦å›è»¢æ©Ÿèƒ½ï¼ˆ0Â°,90Â°,180Â°,270Â°ï¼‰
- å›è»¢è§’åº¦ã«å¿œã˜ãŸä½ç½®è¨ˆç®—æ©Ÿèƒ½

diff --git a/app/src/domain/PuyoPair.test.ts b/app/src/domain/PuyoPair.test.ts
